name: Wind Mill
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The wind mill has a majestic, industrious atmosphere with the sound of large sails turning in the wind and the scent of grain being ground into flour and the rhythmic creaking of the massive structure. The air carries the promise of harnessing wind power and the essential nature of sustainable energy, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of natural power utilization and the importance of creating food products through renewable energy sources.
